nodes.text: Serrok was a Human male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire. During the Cold War between the Sith and the Galactic Republic Serrok was stationed on the planet Alderaan where he aided the Noble House of Thul in capturing Fort Orrus, a stronghold belonging to the rival House of Organa. Serrok was later killed by Republic forces that reclaimed the fort.

Serrok was a Sith Lord loyal to the Sith Empire during the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on the planet Alderaan during the war and during the civil war there, which took place during the Cold War, Serrok aided the Imperial aligned Noble House of Thul. He joined Thul troops lead by General Varus Thul, in the conquest of Fort Orrus, a stronghold of the Republic aligned House of Organa. Serrok and his men successfully destroyed the Fort's defenses and killed or captured the Organa troops garrisoned there.
Serrok was killed in the year 3643 BBY by Republic forces that reclaimed Fort Orrus for House Organa.
Serrok was a male Human who was Force-sensitive and often Force choked enemies in combat. He had white skin, black hair and yellow eyes.
Serrok wore red armor in combat and wielded a single–handed red bladed lightsaber.
Serrok first appeared as an enemy in the quest "Reclaiming Fort Orrus" with in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released by BioWare in 2011.
